All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actions
    This is where all player actions and game actions in the game are stored and called.
    Apple  
    BigHeal  
    Burger  
    Captain
    Captain Will not fly through asteroid fields
    CharacterCreationScreen
    All Crew Members are Created here with desired training and name
    Chef
    Chefs receive double value from Eating food.
    Chicken  
    Chocolate  
    ConsumeItemScreen
    Player chooses what to consume and then it is consumed.
    Crew
    Class the represents the crew, keeps track of everything.
    CrewMember
    Crew member class, keeps track of health, alive status, name, hunger level, tiredness level, specilization, the remaing actions and whether or not they're infected with the space plague.
    CrewMemberCommandScreen
    All commands given to crew members from here
    Doctor
    Doctor receives double value from medicine
    EnergyDrink  
    Engineer
    Engineer is twice as good at repairing ship
    Explorer
    Explorer more likely to find something something
    FoodItem
    It subclass of Item has a nutrition value attached
    Game
    Class to keep track of all game State information
    GameOverScreen
    Screen to tell the user there final score
    GameSetupScreen
    Player chooses name and how many days they want to play before heading off to character creation
    Item  
    Jedi
    Jedi have 150 health.
    MainScreen
    Screen to send you to all other screens and display relevant information
    MedicalItem
    Item.Medicine class each medicine has a price, name, heal value and whether it cures the plague or not
    MovePlanetScreen
    This Screen allows the player to fly the ship to new planet
    PlagueHeal  
    Planet
    Planet class to keep track of whether a part has been found at each planet and the name of the planet
    ShopScreen
    Screen to buy everything from
    SmallHeal  
    Trader
    Trader get half off at the shop
    Water
